Name: Summer Americano
Ingredients: 5 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
Instructions: STIR first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with tonic water.
History: Created in May 2015 by Ignacio "Nacho" Vázquez, the Spanish Martini Brand Ambassador. Naturally Nacho originally used Martini Bitter.
Nutrition: One serving of Summer Americano contains 133 calories
